attributes.action: Give Retired Captain Tom Moore a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moore has raised over 6 million Pound to aid the NHS during the Covid 19 outbreak and deserves to be recognised by his country.
attributes.background: Id like the government to immediately Give Captain Tom Moore a Knighthood

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
